channel.title: Weird
channel.description:
I cant figure out how to make a ghost shopkeeper (1699) pull up a shop menu when I talk/trade with him. ~~~~~ so I did an experiment. I had this code on my client.java
[code] else if (NPCID == 535) { // FAIRY KEEPER IN ADMIN ZONE PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; } else if (NPCID == 1699) { // Ghost shopkeeper in Varrock dummy PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5;[/code]
the ghost still didnt pull up anything... so i change the code to this:
[code] else if (NPCID == 535) { // FAIRY KEEPER IN ADMIN ZONE PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } else if (NPCID == 1699) { // Ghost shopkeeper in Varrock dummy PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2;[/code]
notice the "WanneShop =" (I change the numbers)
When I went onto my server, I went to the fairy then traded with her The shop that pulled up was 2? (shop ID)
Does anybody know what im missing or whats goin on? and I did save, then compile.

item.title: Weird
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Ok, Go to the tutorial forum and go into the rules thread and download the

“Old tutorial backup list.”

Look up my name and look for one of my tuts called “Beanscape Shopping mall”

Use that tutorial as an example of how to add shops.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird

item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

why dont you just try to search in auto spawn, and search for one of the varrok shopekeepers and change th code to 1699 and then change the spawn coords and then go into shops and set the code to what you want to sell…

item.title: Weird
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Make sure the wannshop = (Number id) = the shop id.

If it says wannashop = 2 it will open Shop Id 2 from Shops.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

I cant figure out how to make a ghost shopkeeper (1699)
pull up a shop menu when I talk/trade with him.

so I did an experiment.
I had this code on my client.java
 
[code] else if (NPCID == 535) { // FAIRY KEEPER IN ADMIN ZONE
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2;
}
 else if (NPCID == 1699) { // Ghost shopkeeper in Varrock dummy
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 5;[/code]

the ghost still didnt pull up anything...
so i change the code to this:

[code] else if (NPCID == 535) { // FAIRY KEEPER IN ADMIN ZONE
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 5;
}
 else if (NPCID == 1699) { // Ghost shopkeeper in Varrock dummy
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2;[/code]

notice the "WanneShop ="
(I change the numbers)

When I went onto my server, 
I went to the fairy then traded with her
The shop that pulled up was 2? (shop ID)

Does anybody know what im missing or whats goin on?
and I did save, then compile.

Read full topic
